languages.text: {n}Леди Вьятт отшатывается, как от пощечины, но мгновенно берет себя в руки и безукоризненно вежливо отвечает:{/n} "Я безмерно сожалею, что не оправдала надежд Вашей Светлости и буду рада любой возможности реабилитироваться в ваших глазах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Леди Вьятт отшатывается, как от пощечины, но мгновенно берет себя в руки и безукоризненно вежливо отвечает:{/n} "Я безмерно сожалею, что не оправдала надежд Вашей Светлости и буду рада любой возможности реабилитироваться в ваших глазах".

languages.text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

{n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

{n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

languages.text: {n}Vistenza recule comme si vous l'aviez souffletée, mais elle se ressaisit aussitôt et répond avec une courtoisie irréprochable :{/n} « Je suis sincèrement navrée de ne pas avoir répondu aux attentes de Votre Seigneurie et je suis prête à tout pour me racheter à vos yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza recule comme si vous l'aviez souffletée, mais elle se ressaisit aussitôt et répond avec une courtoisie irréprochable :{/n} « Je suis sincèrement navrée de ne pas avoir répondu aux attentes de Votre Seigneurie et je suis prête à tout pour me racheter à vos yeux. »

languages.text: {n}Vistenza retrocede como si le hubieras dado una bofetada, pero recupera la compostura y responde con una educación sublime:{/n} «Estoy muy disgustada por no haber podido cumplir sus expectativas, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Cualquier oportunidad para redimirme será bien recibida».
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza retrocede como si le hubieras dado una bofetada, pero recupera la compostura y responde con una educación sublime:{/n} «Estoy muy disgustada por no haber podido cumplir sus expectativas, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Cualquier oportunidad para redimirme será bien recibida».

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァは、まるであなたに手錠をかけられたかのように反発するが、すぐに冷静さを取り戻し、非の打ちどころのない礼儀正しさを示した。{/n}「陛下のご期待に添えず、大変申し訳ございませんでした。名誉挽回の機会をいただけるのであれば、喜んでお受けいたします」
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィステンツァは、まるであなたに手錠をかけられたかのように反発するが、すぐに冷静さを取り戻し、非の打ちどころのない礼儀正しさを示した。{/n}「陛下のご期待に添えず、大変申し訳ございませんでした。名誉挽回の機会をいただけるのであれば、喜んでお受けいたします」

languages.text: {n}维丝坦萨猛地退了一步，仿佛挨了你一个巴掌。但随后，她马上恢复了镇定，以无可挑剔的礼仪答复道。{/n}“我辜负了大人您的期望，我对此深表遗憾。如果您能给我机会，挽回我在您心目中的形象，我愿意以任何方式为您效劳。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}维丝坦萨猛地退了一步，仿佛挨了你一个巴掌。但随后，她马上恢复了镇定，以无可挑剔的礼仪答复道。{/n}“我辜负了大人您的期望，我对此深表遗憾。如果您能给我机会，挽回我在您心目中的形象，我愿意以任何方式为您效劳。”

languages.text: {n}Vistenza schreckt zurück, als hättest du sie geohrfeigt, findet ihre Fassung aber sofort wieder und erwidert mit makelloser Höflichkeit: {/n} "Ich bin überaus betrübt, die Erwartungen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nicht zu erfüllen. Ich werde jede Möglichkeit nutzen, mich in Euren Augen reinzuwaschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza schreckt zurück, als hättest du sie geohrfeigt, findet ihre Fassung aber sofort wieder und erwidert mit makelloser Höflichkeit: {/n} "Ich bin überaus betrübt, die Erwartungen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nicht zu erfüllen. Ich werde jede Möglichkeit nutzen, mich in Euren Augen reinzuwaschen."

languages.text: {n}Vistenza, sanki onu kelepçeye vurmuşsun gibi irkiliyor. Ancak anında sakinleşerek kusursuz bir kibarlıkla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin beklentilerini karşılayamadığım için ziyadesiyle üzüntü içerisindeyim. Size kendimi affettirmek için tüm fırsatları değerlendireceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza recoils as if you had cuffed her, but instantly regains her composure and responds with impeccable politeness,{/n} "I am exceedingly regretful at having failed to meet Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s expectations. I will welcome any opportunity to redeem myself in your eyes."
